creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
inscription: 白日照幽居　讀書林下坐　出門時見山　無復人知我 (Bright sunlight illuminates my hidden dwelling; / I sit, reading books beneath the trees. / Out from the gate, at times I view the mountains: / There are no men here to know of me.) [Jonathan Chaves]
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #3]; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #4], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4]; LRC: 蓬莱山下人 {Hōraisan genin}
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on silk
signed: 昭和己巳秋日寫於吾子知意蕭山軒古人碧翁 {Shōwa tsuchinoto-mi shūjitsu %%%%%%% Kojin Hekiō} (Autumn day in 1929, drawn at ?, Kojin Hekiō)
title: Landscape with White Clouds; Autumn, from a set of Landscapes of the Four Seasons
